summary: To get to know his girlfriend's son, a working-class good guy volunteers to pick him up from his prep school, only to learn that he isn't the nicest young man.
cast: Ed O'Neill|Ethan Embry|JoBeth Williams|Christopher McDonald|Ari Meyers|Elizabeth Daily|L. Scott Caldwell|Kathleen Freeman|Lisa Figus|Cedering Fox|Shelby Leverington|Kyle Fredericks|David James Alexander|Ross Borden|Joe Baker|Laura Brumage|Will Estes|Robert Sutherland Telfer|Patrika Darbo|Ron Payne|Tom Chatlos|Ina Edell|Warren Rice|Mickey Jones|Brenda Pickleman|Billy 'Sly' Williams|Jerry Darr|Vincent Craig Dupree|Sam Menning|Tracy J. Connor|Theresa Bell|Pat Asanti|Barry Doe|Phyllis Franklin|J.C. MacKenzie|Ann Hearn|Gene Whittington|Jesshaye Callier|Jack Murdock|Jackie Lee Sander|Diana Chesney|Louise La Planche|Michael Summers|Chris Valenzano
title: Tu novio huele mal
